original_text: when all Israel comes to appear before the Lord your God at the place that he will choose, you shall read this law before all Israel in their hearing.
korean_text: 온 이스라엘이 네 하나님 여호와 앞 그가 택하신 곳에 모일 때에 이 율법을 낭독하여 온 이스라엘에게 듣게 할지니

sentences.original_text: to appear before the Lord your God
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 하나님 여호와 앞에 나타나기 위해

sentences.original_text: at the place that he will choose
before all Israel in their hearing
